text: Your company would like to understand what fields are masked in the Einstein Trust Layer and potentially mask some additional fields that contain sensitive data. What is true in this scenario?

alternatives.text: Data masking is done automatically and it is not possible to mask additional fields
All data maskling must be done manually
Supported entries can be masked via Configure Data Masking

text: Which feature of the Einstein Trust Layer safeguards personally identifiable information (PII) before it is seen by the AI model?
How does Einstein Trust Layer help prevent harmful data leaks?

alternatives.text: By storing data securely for future use
By ensuring a Zero Data Retention Policy

text: Why is Prompt Defence important in the Einstein Trust Layer?

alternatives.text: To enhance the speed of AI responses
To prevent harmful or biased content from being generetaed
To store user prompts for future analysis
